oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Davy Crockett portrait
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Portrait of David Crockett (1786-1836) painted by S.S. Osgood. Portrait from waist up. He wears a dark suit, vest and necktie with a white collar that meets his jawline. Sideburns facial hair. Writing at bottom. With signature and inscription: I am happy to acknowledge this to be the only correct likeness that has been taken of me.
Pioneer and U.S. Congressman from Tennessee, 1827-1831, 1833-1835.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Crockett, Davy, 1786-1836
